metadata.title: CVE-2021-45985 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Lua 5.4.3, an erroneous finalizer called during a tail call leads to aheap-based buffer over-read.

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
